## ❔ Basic Overview

The aim is to set up <ins>one</ins> container that runs 
- <img width='26' src='data:image/png;base64,' /> Nginx, 
- <img width='26' src='https://mariadb.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/mariadb-logo-vert_blue-transparent.png' /> MySQL, 
- <img width='26' src='https://www.freeiconspng.com/thumbs/phpmyadmin-icon/phpmyadmin-icon-6.png' /> phpMyAdmin and 
- <img width='26' src='https://cdn.iconscout.com/icon/free/png-512/wordpress-35-569289.png' /> WordPress.

## :whale: Outcome
